abstract: A word cloud illustrates the arguments Adobe and Apple are making in their debate over Flash and the iPhone and iPad.
snippet: A word cloud illustrates the arguments Adobe and Apple are making in their debate over Flash and the iPhone and iPad.
lead_paragraph: As I reported on Thursday, Adobe is beginning a full-force print and Web advertising campaign to criticize Apple’s refusal to allow its Flash multimedia software on its iPhone operating system.

headline.main: Word For Word: The Apple & Adobe Letters
